snippet: The Straphangers Campaign conducted its first review of platform conditions across the city.
abstract: The Straphangers Campaign conducted its first review of platform conditions across the city.
lead_paragraph: It may not come as much of a surprise that a survey of subway station platforms released on Thursday found peeling paint, broken staircases and perilously exposed wiring. And rats.

headline.main: Subway Survey Finds Rats, Yes, but Maybe Not as Many
